item.title: 利用Prometheusalert打造Prometheus告警消息聚合
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: 部署prometheusalert Copy 1 2 3 4 git clone https://github.com/feiyu563/PrometheusAlert.git cd PrometheusAlert/example/helm/prometheusalert #更新config/app.conf设置登陆用户信息，并配置数据库信息 helm install -n monitoring . 创建企
